desc: Senor Lopez products are crafted using 100% recycled materials and fabrics. We pride ourselves in all of the details; the fit, the colors, and the patterns. All fabric is washed, softened, and pre shrunk before use so we guarantee you get the fit you desire!

layout.text: Señor Lopez is the original and most versatile, Mexican Beach Blanket on the market. Our products are crafted using entirely recycled t-shirt materials and fabrics. We pride ourselves in all of the details; the fit, the colors, and the patterns. All fabric is washed, softened, and pre-shrunk before use so we guarantee you get the fit you desire!
